title:
Connecting affine $\mathcal{W}$-algebras: A case study on
  $\mathfrak{sl}_4$
authors: Justine Fasquel, Zachary Fehily, Ethan Fursman, Shigenori Nakatsuka
abstract:
We introduce the partial reductions and inverse Hamiltonian reductions
between affine $\mathcal{W}$-algebras along the closure relations of associated
nilpotent orbits in the case of $\mathfrak{sl}_4$, fulfilling all the missing
constructions in the literature. We also apply the partial reductions to
modules in the Kazhdan-Lusztig category and show compatibility with the usual
reductions of Weyl modules.
